I was on one in=
vestigation with about 8 others where I had both a digital audio 
recorder =
and a video recorder going. I got the same EVP on both machines. Other 
peo=
ple next to me did not get them. In other cases they got EVP and I, a coupl=
e 
feet away, got nothing on either machine. That was fascinating to me.

r: Flying on plane.......I have asked the Q..Are
